var permission=JSON.parse(config.data).permission;var length=data.permissions.length;var lastIndex=0;if(length){lastIndex=data.permissions[length-1].id;}permission.id=lastIndex+1;permission.assignedTo=['administrator'];var now=new Date();var months=now.toLocaleDateString('en-US',{year:'numeric',month:'short',day:'numeric'}).replace(',','');var time=now.toLocaleString('en-US',{hour:'numeric',minute:'numeric',hour12:true});var monthsArr=months.split(' ');/*eslint-disable */var moveElement=function moveElement(array,sourceIndex,destinationIndex){return array.map(function(a){return a===sourceIndex?array.find(function(a){return a===destinationIndex;}):a===destinationIndex?array.find(function(a){return a===sourceIndex;}):a;});};var finalDate=moveElement(monthsArr,monthsArr[0],monthsArr[1]).join(' ');permission.createdDate="".concat(finalDate,", ").concat(time);data.permissions.unshift(permission);return[201,{permission:permission}];});mock.onPost('/apps/permissions/update-permission').reply(function(config){// Get permission from post data
var _JSON$parse=JSON.parse(config.data),id=_JSON$parse.id,name=_JSON$parse.name;data.permissions.find(function(i){if(i.id===id){i.name=name;}});return[201];});// DELETE: Deletes Permissions
mock.onDelete('/apps/permissions/delete').reply(function(config){// Get  id from URL
var permissionID=config.id;// Convert Id to number
permissionID=Number(permissionID);var permissionIndex=data.permissions.findIndex(function(t){return t.id===permissionID;});data.permissions.splice(permissionIndex,1);return[200];});
